title: 52p land for sale close to Peradeniya
details: 52 perch freehold hilly property situated along Eriyagama – Aladeniya Road, 2km from Peradeniya and 8km to Kandy. Water, electricity and phone lines available. Very good main road access. Property includes semi-permanent residential building of 450 sq.ft. This land is situated in a peaceful, residential location with scenic views of Kandy available from the top of the hill. Land is suitable for residential and commercial developments such as apartments, hotel, yoga retreat, etc.
